Expected Result: Admin can login with valid credentials and access admin dashboard.
Non-admin users are denied access to admin pages and redirected to access denied page.
Admin can view complete list of all users (renters owners admins) with search and filter options.
Admin can search users by name email or phone number.
Admin can filter users by role (Renter Owner Admin).
Admin can suspend user account and user cannot login while suspended.
Admin can reactivate suspended user account and user can login again.
Admin can permanently delete user account (except admin accounts and users with active bookings).
Admin can view list of owners awaiting ID verification with pending status.
Admin approves owner ID and owner status changes to "Verified Owner" with verification date.
Admin rejects owner verification with reason and owner status changes to "Rejected".
Admin can view complete list of all bike listings with search and filter options.
Admin can manually set bike status (Available Maintenance Inactive) making it searchable or hidden.
Admin can permanently delete bike listing (only if no active bookings).
Admin can view complete list of all bookings with filters (by status and date range).
Admin dashboard displays user statistics bike statistics booking statistics financial statistics and recent activity.
Admin can view all reviews with search/filters and delete inappropriate reviews.
Admin can view all reports with filters (by type status priority) update status and assign reports.
Admin can send test notifications to verify SignalR functionality and delivery.

Unit Test: Test Location Tracking and SMS Services
Expected Result: Admin can send test location updates and test SMS messages to verify functionality.
